name: Electro Elemental Infusion
description:
The character to which this is attached has their Physical DMG dealt converted to Electro DMG, and Electro DMG dealt by the character +1.
Duration (Rounds): 3
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached has their $[K100] dealt converted to $[K104], and $[K104] dealt by the character +1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 3</color>
descriptionreplaced: The character to which this is attached has their {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>, and {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> dealt by the character +1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>: 3</color>
